attributes.action: make a public statement to explain to the taxpayer why he, or any of his cronies, feel they have the moral authority to discuss how the taxpayer is to be taxed in future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the epitome of hypocrisy for MPs to discuss the removal of the Winter Heating Allowances from some groups of pensioners while at the same time voting in, for themselves, continuing TAX FREE payment of ALL the heating costs at their second homes.  There are hundreds of thousands of taxpayers - who are nowhere near as financially well off as the 646 MP self-enriching troughers we currently have, who have second  homes because of the lack of employment opportunities in the area where their family resides, for which they can get absolutely no help with the heating costs.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
